decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The door(s) of the garage hereby permitted shall not open over or encroach in any way on the highway, or shared accessway.

Condition : 3 - Before the building/extension hereby permitted is first occupied, the windows in the build elevation of the shall be glazed with obscured glass and fixed shut and shall be maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 4 - The three existing trees at the rear of the site on the Strathearn Road frontage shall be retained and maintained to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority. Reason for condition:To preserve and maintain the visual amenities and character of the locality.
description: ERECTION OF TWO STOREY BUILDING TO PROVIDE TWO FLATS COMPRISING TWO 2 BEDROOM FLATS WITH 2 CAR PARKING SPACES AT REAR (RENEWAL OF PLANNING PERMISSION GRANTED 16TH NOVEMBER 1983).
